text: Sir Jack Arnold Hayward (14 June 1923 - 13 January 2015) was an English businessman, property developer, and philanthropist. He was the president of football club Wolverhampton Wanderers from 1990 until 2007. Hayward was born in Wolverhampton. He married Jean Mary Forder in 1948 and had two sons, Rick and Jonathan, and a daughter Susan. Hayward died on 13 January 2015 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, United States. He was 91. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English businesspeople Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:People from Wolverhampton Category:English philanthropists
title: Jack Hayward
